scripts.pretest: yarn build && yarn truffle migrate --reset --network development
scripts.deploy-rinkeby: rm -rf build/ && yarn truffle compile && yarn truffle migrate --network rinkeby && yarn truffle-flattener contracts/DateCoinCrowdsale.sol
scripts.predeploy: rm -rf deploy/ && mkdir -vp deploy/ && node_modules/.bin/truffle-flattener contracts/DateCoin.sol > deploy/DateCoin.full.sol && node_modules/.bin/truffle-flattener contracts/DateCoinCrowdsale.sol > deploy/DateCoinCrowdsale.full.sol
